018package com.github.tommyettinger.tantrum.libgdx;
019
020import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector4;
021import org.apache.fury.Fury;
022import org.apache.fury.memory.MemoryBuffer;
023import org.apache.fury.serializer.Serializer;
024
025/**
026 * Fury {@link Serializer} for libGDX {@link Vector4}s.
027 */
028public class Vector4Serializer extends Serializer<Vector4> {
029    public Vector4Serializer(Fury fury) {
030        super(fury, Vector4.class);
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public void write(final MemoryBuffer output, final Vector4 data) {
035        output.writeFloat32(data.x);
036        output.writeFloat32(data.y);
037        output.writeFloat32(data.z);
038        output.writeFloat32(data.w);
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public Vector4 read(MemoryBuffer input) {
043        return new Vector4(input.readFloat32(), input.readFloat32(), input.readFloat32(), input.readFloat32());
044    }
045}
